title: QuickCar Racing Products 55-010 Red 2-1/2" High x 2-1/2" Wide Handle Battery Master Disconnect Switch with Black Mounting Panel
description: This QuickCar Battery Master Disconnect Switch comes with a black square mounting Panel that measures 2-1/2”x2-1/2” Most racing organizations and sanctioning bodies require these for an emergency cut-off switch. QuickCar's master disconnect switch has a bright red epoxy coated handle and accepts 3/8" ring terminals.
